short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically wraps all reddit comments in a thread with the greatest rap verse of all time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Here To Say is a Chrome extension that attempts to revive the dream of the 80s in every single Reddit comments section.
